member.name: T:CSProject.Program
member.summary: My version of the final project from the book "Learn C# in one day and learn it well" by Jamie Chan (2015)
member.remarks: 01.03.2017 First working version 03.03.2017 Finished adding errorhandling and autogenerated tests. 77% code coverage. Added doc comments

member.name: M:CSProject.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Main program

member.name: T:CSProject.Staff
member.summary: Staff base class

member.name: F:CSProject.Staff.hourlyRate
member.summary: Hourly pay rate

member.name: F:CSProject.Staff.hWorked
member.summary: Hours worked this month

member.name: P:CSProject.Staff.TotalPay
member.summary: Total pay, including overtime and any other compensation

member.name: P:CSProject.Staff.BasicPay
member.summary: Base pay calculated from hours worked and base hourly rate

member.name: P:CSProject.Staff.NameOfStaff
member.summary: Name of staff member

member.name: P:CSProject.Staff.HoursWorked
member.summary: Hours worked this month

member.name: M:CSProject.Staff.#ctor(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Staff base class constructor
member.param: Hourly pay rate of staff member

member.name: M:CSProject.Staff.CalculatePay
member.summary: Calculate monthly salary

member.name: M:CSProject.Staff.ToString
member.summary: Lists all information about staff member and pay for this month
member.returns: Name, payrate, hours worked, base pay and total payment

member.name: T:CSProject.Manager
member.summary: Manager class

member.name: F:CSProject.Manager.managerHourlyRate
member.summary: Hourly rate for managers

member.name: P:CSProject.Manager.Allowance
member.summary: Holds any allowance the Manager has earned this month.

member.name: M:CSProject.Manager.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Manager class constructor Sends name and managers hourly rate to class Staff

member.name: M:CSProject.Manager.CalculatePay
member.summary: Calculate pay for manager. Includes a flat rate Allowance if any overtime is worked this month.

member.name: M:CSProject.Manager.ToString
member.summary: Lists name of manager and all information about hours worked and pay

member.name: T:CSProject.Admin
member.summary: Class for staff members of type 'Admin'

member.name: M:CSProject.Admin.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Admin class constructor
member.remarks: Sets it's own hourly rate for admins

member.name: M:CSProject.Admin.CalculatePay
member.summary: Calculates pay for Admins, including overtime pay.

member.name: M:CSProject.Admin.ToString
member.summary: Lists all parameters for Admin person
member.returns: String listing name, hours worked and all pay information

member.name: T:CSProject.FileReader
member.summary: Class for getting all staff members

member.name: M:CSProject.FileReader.ReadFile
member.summary: Reads all staff members from file staff.txt
member.remarks: Reads from file staff.txt in same folder as .exe file Syntax= 'name, position' on each line Position can be 'Manager' or 'Admin'
member.returns: Staff type List with objects that can be of type Admin or Manager, with attribute 'name'

member.name: M:CSProject.FileReader.#ctor
member.summary: FileReader class constructor

member.name: T:CSProject.PaySlip
member.summary: Class for creating payslip files on disk
member.remarks: Files stored inside folder with .exe file. filename is (Staffmembers name).txt Also creates a summary file of people working less than 10 hours. Filename 'summary.txt'

member.name: F:CSProject.PaySlip.month
member.summary: Store for month property

member.name: F:CSProject.PaySlip.year
member.summary: Store for year property

member.name: T:CSProject.PaySlip.MonthsOfYear
member.summary: Enum for months of the year

member.name: M:CSProject.PaySlip.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor for class PaySlip

member.name: M:CSProject.PaySlip.GeneratePaySlip(System.Collections.Generic.List{CSProject.Staff})
member.summary: Creates a payslip text file for each staff member.
member.remarks: File is named after the individual staff member Ex. John.txt

member.name: M:CSProject.PaySlip.GenerateSummary(System.Collections.Generic.List{CSProject.Staff})
member.summary: Creates a summary text file listing people working less than 10 hours/month
member.remarks: Name of file: 'summary.txt'. Located with *.exe file

member.name: M:CSProject.PaySlip.ToString
member.summary: Returns string with month and year for this payslip batch
